articles.title: Code
articles.description: A place to store code and data from the book
articles.contents:
Diamonds
An example of code and plots displayed within the website. You can download the data here.


library("ggplot2")

ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point()
